name: Orange Stick on Blue Mountain
description:
This game was made in 1 hour and 20 minutes for the Friday Night Game Jam.

You are an orange stick and must climb the blue mountain. You start as a small branch and must collect other sticks to grow larger, increasing your reach. Reach the top of the mountain and you will be a victorious stick.

CONTROLS

wasd to move.

L is some debuggin stuff.
